message: Let's start fair. I propose we split the money 60/40, with me taking the larger share since the money will be worth less for you in the next rounds.
Your offer was a bit too greedy for me. How about a 55/45 split in my favor? The money's depreciating faster for me, remember?
I think it's time to be fair. Let's split the money evenly, 50/50. We both lose money with each round, so an even split seems like the best option to avoid further losses.
